keyword: calories in a mcdonalds sausage mcmuffin
title: Calories in a McDonald's Sausage McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in a McDonald's Sausage McMuffin, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: Calories in a McDonald's Sausage McMuffin
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with egg, pork sausage patty, American cheese, on toasted English muffin; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and customizations; values based on official McDonald's data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's Sausage McMuffin has about 480 kcal, with 21 g protein and 31 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add a hash brown on the side

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's Sausage McMuffin?
What's the protein in a Sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein from the sausage, egg, and cheese.

faqs.q: Is the Sausage McMuffin high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 830 mg sodium, mostly from the sausage and muffin.

faqs.q: Calories in Sausage McMuffin without egg?
faqs.a: Removing the egg reduces it to about 400 kcal.

faqs.q: How does it compare to Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: Sausage version has more fat and calories (480 vs. 300 kcal) due to pork sausage.
